# Create App Store Review Details for an App Clip

**Web Service Endpoint**

Provide App Clip metadata required by App Store Review.

## Managing App Review Details for Your App Clip

- **Read the App Store Review Details of an App Clip**: Get App Store Review details for an App Clip.
- **Modify App Store Review Details for an App Clip**: Update App Clip metadata you provide to App Store Review.
